name: Kimi Gasu-Nana
description:
Guide your gas-powered mechs to victory! To win: destroy all of your opponent's pieces, or "simply" occupy the opposing king's starting tile.

The game is inspired by Chess and Shogi, but there is a catch: you queue up several moves in advance! Once you and your opponent have queued your moves, both turns play out at the same time!

Local play on one device and network play are supported. Please make sure you and your opponent have opened a port and can connect to each other if you want to play a network game.

Future development of this game is likely.
